thread.title: MELISSA
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by MELISSA

author: MELISSA
title: MELISSA
text: While waiting in the line to collect our car I could hear the difficult customers ahead of us. Just completely ill-prepared and annoying with their endless queries and reiterations of what the lady behind the counter was telling them. Throughout the entire time she kept her cool, was informative and gracious in her dealing with them, a true professional and ambassador for Red Spot rentals. Not only did she thank me for my patience when it came to be my turn but we were also treated to an upgrade as no more small cars were available. We were so happy with our car that we will most likely buy a Kia Cerato next when we purchase later this year. All in all my whole experience was 10/10.
